## üåç üåç muaj cov lus

Pyhelper muaj kev txhais cov lus txhais tau txog li ** 131 hom lus ** suav nrog:

## Dependencies (handled automatically):

- pandas, numpy (data manipulation)

- matplotlib, seaborn (visualization)

- scikit-learn (statistics)

- sqlalchemy (database)

- geopandas (spatial data)

## üöÄ installation

Nruab los ntawm PYPI:

```bash
pip install pyhelper-tools-jbhm
```

---

## üìñ Txheej txheem cej luam

** PYHELPER ** yog ib qho tsim nyog Python cov cuab yeej tsim qauv los ua kom yooj yim ** Cov ntaub ntawv tsom xam, kev pom tseeb, kev ua haujlwm tshwj xeeb, thiab cov khoom siv hluav taws xob, thiab cov khoom siv hluav taws xob ** .  
Nws sib xyaw ua ke rau hauv kev kawm, kev tshawb nrhiav, thiab cov phiaj xwm kev ua haujlwm, tso cai rau koj kom pom tseeb txog kev nkag siab ntau dua li boilletplate code.

Cov Ntsiab Lus Tseem Ceeb:
- üßÆ built-in ** kev txheeb cais thiab kev ua lej siv rau kev ua lej ** 
- üìä Yooj yim-rau-siv ** Cov ntaub ntawv pom cov ntawv sau qhwv ** 
- üóÇ Cov Lus Cog Tseg ** Ua cov ntaub ntawv tuav thiab tshawb nrhiav ** 
- üîç ** Syntax siv tau ** rau Python cov ntaub ntawv
- üåç ** Kev txhawb nqa ntau yam lus ** Nrog kev siv cov lus txhais
- üöÄ Optimized rau ** Qauv Qauv Tawm Tshiab ** thiab ** Kawm Ntawv ** 

---

## ‚ú® cov yam ntxwv tseem ceeb

### üìä Cov ntaub ntawv tshawb nrhiav
- Cov kab kos bar: kab rov tav & ntsug (`hbar`, `vbar`)  
- Cov Khoom Siv Hluav Taws Xob: Cov Histograms (`histo`), Lub thawv ntawv œÄ537_, KDE plots (`kdeplot`)  
- Sib piv cov khoom: violin, swarm, sawb daim phiaj  
- Cov tshuaj ntsuam txheeb: tshav kub kub (`heatmap`), mus rau cov phiaj xwm ntau œÄs_34_  
- Advanced Visualizations: Khub Cov Zos, cov phiaj xwm sib koom ua ke, kev sib koom ua ke thaj chaw  
- Cov ntaub ntawv cov ntaub ntawv: Ua cov ntaub ntawv qhia tawm (`table`)  

### üìà analysisüìàistist essistical
- ** CANCE HOM PHIAJ ** : txhais tau tias (`get_media`), median (`get_median`), hom (`get_moda`)  
- ** HAIV NEEG ** : NTAU YAM (`get_rank`), VARCIALY (`get_var`), qauv kev sib txawv (`get_desv`)  
- ** Tsom tawm ** : Dispersion qhia (`disp`), IQR suav, normalization, kev hloov pauv  
- ** Kev tshawb nrhiav sab nrauv ** : IQR thiab Z-qhab nia  

### üóÇÔ∏è Kev Tswj Xyuas Cov Ntaub Ntawv
- Ntse Nrhiav nrog `call()` (auto-detect CSV, JSON, XML, etc.)  
- Ntau hom kev txhawb nqa (CSV, JSON, XML, PDF, spatial data)  
- SQL cov kev tswj hwm database nrog `DataBase` chav kawm  
- Hloov pauv nqi hluav taws xob (`convert_file`)  

### üõ†Ô∏è Cov cuab yeej tsim khoom
- Hloov system (`Switch`, `AsyncSwitch`)  
- syntax checking (`check_syntax`, `PythonFileChecker`)  
- Yuam kev nplua nuj ceeb toom (multi-language)  
- Kev Pab Cuam Tshuam Cov Txheej Txheem (`help`)  

### üåç Internationalization
- 100+ built-infilts  
- Thauj cov kev cai txhais  
- Runtime Lus Hloov (`set_language() `)  
- Automatic English fallback  

---

## Dependencies (handled automatically):

- pandas, numpy (data manipulation)

- matplotlib, seaborn (visualization)

- scikit-learn (statistics)

- sqlalchemy (database)

- geopandas (spatial data)

---

## üîß Usage Examples

### Set language 

**support for up to 131 languages** 
```python
from helper import set_language

set_language("en")  # English
set_language("es")  # Spanish
set_language("fr")  # French
set_language("de")  # German
set_language("ru")  # Russian
set_language("tr")  # Turkish
set_language("zh")  # Chinese
set_language("it")  # Italian
set_language("pt")  # Portuguese
set_language("sv")  # Swedish
set_language("ja")  # Japanese
set_language("ar")  # Arabic
...
```


### Cov Txheeb Xyuas Yooj Yim
```python
import helper as hp

data = [1, 2, 2, 3, 4, 5]

print(hp.get_media(data))   # Mean
print(hp.get_median(data))  # Median
print(hp.get_moda(data))    # Mode
```

### Visualization
```python
import helper as hp

df = hp.pd.DataFrame({"values": [5, 3, 7, 2, 9]})
hp.histo(df, "values", bins=5, title="Sample Histogram")
```

### cov ntaub ntawv tuav
```python
from helper import call

data = call(name="my_data", type="csv")  # Finds and loads a CSV file automatically
```

### kev cai txhais lus
```python
from helper import load_user_translations

# Load custom translations from lang.json
load_user_translations("custom/lang.json")
```

### Syntax kev siv tau
```python
from helper import run

run("./path/to/my_script.py")
#Show gui pop up with results
```

---

## üìÇ txoj haujlwm qauv

```
helper/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ core.py
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ __init__.py
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ lang/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ en.json
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ es.json
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ... (100+ files)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ submodules/
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ graph.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ statics.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ utils.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ caller.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ checker.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ manager.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pyswitch.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ shared.py
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ DBManager.py
```

## üîÆ roadmap

- Cov hom pom kev ntxiv

- txuas ntxiv database txhawb (NoSQL, graph databases)

- Tshuab Kev Kawm Sib Tham

- Web-based interface

- plugin system

---

‚ö° Npaj kom zoo rau koj cov Python workflows nrog ** Pyhelper ** ? Pib tshawb txog hnub no!
